AT.name: Batman Arkham City: Armoured Edition
AT.description: Produziert von WB Games Montreal, ist die BATMAN: ARKHAM CITY ARMOURED EDITION die weiter entwickelte Version des preisgekrönten Blockbuster-Videospiels aus dem Hause Rocksteady Studios. Bei der Wii U™-Version sind Geschichte und Gameplay genauso abwechslungsreich wie beim ursprünglichen Titel. Diese Version bietet zudem verbesserte Spielmechanismen und Funktionen, die durch die Wii U™ und das Wii U™ GamePad ermöglicht werden.

movies.name: Batman Arkham City Armoured Edition Launch Trailer

AU.name: Batman Arkham City: Armoured Edition
AU.description: Developed by WB Games Montreal, BATMAN: ARKHAM CITY ARMOURED EDITION is the enhanced version of the award-winning blockbuster videogame created by Rocksteady Studios. The Wii U™ version delivers the same impactful story and gameplay as the original title, this time with enhanced gameplay mechanics and features made possible with the Wii U™ and the Wii U™ GamePad.

movies.name: Batman Arkham City Armoured Edition Launch Trailer

BG.name: Batman Arkham City: Armoured Edition
BG.description: Developed by WB Games Montreal, BATMAN: ARKHAM CITY ARMOURED EDITION is the enhanced version of the award-winning blockbuster videogame created by Rocksteady Studios. The Wii U™ version delivers the same impactful story and gameplay as the original title, this time with enhanced gameplay mechanics and features made possible with the Wii U™ and the Wii U™ GamePad.

BE.name: BATMAN: ARKHAM CITY ARMORED EDITION
BE.description: Développé par WB Games Montréal, BATMAN: ARKHAM CITY ARMORED EDITION est la version améliorée du jeu vidéo acclamé par la critique et les joueurs, créé par Rocksteady Studios. La version Wii U™ propose la même histoire marquante et le même gameplay que l’original, tout en offrant des mécaniques de jeu améliorées et des fonctionnalités rendues possible par la Wii U™ et le Wii U™ GamePad.

movies.name: Batman: Arkham City Wii U Trailer de Lancement

ES.name: Batman Arkham City: Armoured Edition
ES.description: Desarrollado por WB Games Montreal, BATMAN: ARKHAM CITY ARMOURED EDITION es la versión mejorada del galardonado superventas creado por Rocksteady Studios. La versión para Wii U™ cuenta con la misma jugabilidad y la impactante historia del videojuego original, pero con funciones y la mecánica de jugabilidad mejoradas gracias a la consola Wii U™ y al Wii U™ GamePad.

movies.name: Tráiler de lanzamiento Batman: Arkham City Wii U

IT.name: Batman Arkham City: Armoured Edition
IT.description: Sviluppato da WB Games Montreal, BATMAN: ARKHAM CITY ARMOURED EDITION è la nuova versione potenziata del pluripremiato videogioco creato da Rocksteady Studios. La versione per Wii U™ contiene la stessa avvincente storia e stile del titolo originale, ma con meccaniche di gioco potenziate per sfruttare al massimo le funzionalità di Wii U™ e Wii U™ GamePad.

movies.name: Batman: Arkham City Wii U – Trailer di lancio

NL.name: Batman: Arkham City Armoured Edition
NL.description: Ontwikkeld door WB Games Montreal BATMAN: ARKHAM CITY ARMOURED EDITION is de verbeterde versie van de award-winnende kaskraker van Rocksteady Studios. De Wii U™ versie levert dezelfde aangrijpende verhaallijn en gameplay als de originele titel, maar deze keer met verbeterde gameplay en meer mogelijkheden dankzij de revolutionaire Wii U™ GamePad.

movies.name: Batman Arkham City Armoured Edition Launch Trailer

RU.name: BATMAN: ARKHAM CITY ARMOURED EDITION
RU.description: BATMAN: ARKHAM CITY ARMOURED EDITION от WB Games Montreal – это улучшенная версия популярной видеоигры, созданной Rocksteady Studios. В версии для Wii U™ представлен тот же драматический сюжет, что и в оригинальной игре, причем механика игрового процесса даже улучшена, а еще в игру добавлены функции, которые поддерживаются благодаря уникальным возможностям Wii U™ и Wii U™ GamePad.

movies.name: Ролик к выпуску игры Batman: Arkham City Wii U
